name: Kingdom Hearts Re: 1.975 / Rebirth Days (Flowt)
description:
! THIS IS A FULLSCREEN GAME !
Move                    WASD / Arrows
Attack                   Enter / Mouse 1 / Z
Guard(Dodge)           Shift / Mouse 2 / X / Space
Pause                   Esc / Tab
Performance Issues? Try the Windows version!
Try a different level by selecting a new difficulty option!
This is a fan game / remake using art assets from Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories (2004), intended as a gift for the Kingdom Hearts Community at large. I claim no personal ownership of anything except for the code. All art and sound assets owned by Disney and Square Enix, something something all rights reserved.
Find out more: Twitter
